reviewtext: I had a Plantronics headset before, and they've definitely improved on what I already liked:  great sound quality--most people say they can't tell I have any background noise even when I'm in the car, and comfortable headset.I use the over-the-ear version of it so I can hear best, and they've added a mute button on the headset cord, as well as the volume control.A great value for the money, and hard to improve on for any price.
